page.title: 33A Day in the life
page.content:
Saturday

Blaine came over for a sleepover and we watched a DVD. The film was called Paul. It was funny .

After breakfast I went to the Thames Barrier with mum, dad, Blaine and my brother when we got there I saw a climbing frame and it was fun playing on it. Then we went in to this information room and I saw a working model of the Thames Barrier and there was a video about how the Thames Barrier worked and when the sun came out we went for a walk along the river .

Then it rained and we went to get something to eat and dropped Blaine back home.


Pupli-Montbelle School
